name: Fulminar
description: The Fulminar is a large elemental creature radiating bolts of lightning, allowing it to move swiftly in aerial combat. It has glowing fields of light surrounding it, indicating its mastery over electrical powers.
memorable: Its ability to create shackles of lightning that can restrain its foes while delivering substantial damage makes it a formidable presence in battle.
goals: Commonly seeks to dominate aerial battlegrounds and strike down opponents with lightning-infused attacks.
relations: Often encountered along with other elemental creatures, particularly those that embody the storm or sky.
environment: Typically found in stormy regions or elevated places where it can harness and amplify its lightning abilities.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for exceptional agility and evasiveness in combat. Immune to poison and resistant to common forms of physical damage.
weaknesses: Susceptible to magical attacks; possesses low Intelligence, limiting its strategic planning.
attacks: Multiattack includes a bite and claw attacks that deal both physical and lightning damage, along with control effects.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Shackles, which can restrain foes and deal significant lightning damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 17, allowing it to effectively locate threats.
skills: Highly skilled in stealth and perception, making it adept at remaining hidden and aware.
additional_information: Does not provoke opportunity attacks when flying out of reach.
Can alter the glow radius of its Essence of Lightning.
Can occupy spaces as narrow as 1 inch wide.
test_queries: elemental that can restrain with lightning
elemental immune to poison and grapple
